name: IHF Handball Challenge 12
description: With IHF Handball Challenge 12 users can experience the fascinating sport of handball on their PC. Up to five players can compete for national and international trophies in the TOYOTA Handball- Bundesliga, the Spanish Liga ASOBAL or the IHF World Cup.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Vista, XP Processor: Dual Core CPU with 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphic card with ShaderModel 3.0 and 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: If you play handball, get this game right now. If you don't play handball, avoid, only true handball players will love this.

i am enlightened this game is my life from the moment that it gave me a blue screen i realized that the past 20 minutes of gameplay meant so much  i appreciate every single living breathign moment of my life now thank you handball i love hand ball i hope t oplay the next games  i loved and appreciated the quicktime events  good pc port if this was even put on consoles  developed first and foremost for pc users
